name: Treehouse Crush
description:
Build up your defense against your nasty nightbour and show them who is the king of the treehouses!

This is a "Splitscreen" two player game, so grab a friend and have fun!

Treehouse Crush has two Phases:

Phase 1 - Select Materials such as Wood, Metal and Pillows to build up barriers and create an effective defense against fruits thrown by your enemy.

Phase 2 - Select a Fruit you want to throw, drag back on the screen and try to hit your enemy. Usually you have to hit the barriers first to get to your target. They will break after a few hits depending on the selected
